mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_operation_log_ext where exists(select * from ujcms_operation_log t where t.id_ = ujcms_operation_log_ext.id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_operation_log_ext (id_, request_url_, request_body_, response_entity_, exception_stack_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requestBody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{responseEntity,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{exceptionStack,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
